name: Thetford 92860 Porta Potti 135, White
short_description: Award-Winning Portable Toilet for RVs, boats, trucks, vans, healthcare, camping and even off-the-grid lifestyle
Modern Appearance in a durable, easy-to-use and clean design, with removable seat and cover
2. 6-gallon Waste Water Holding Tank with rotating Pour-Out Spout and 2. 6-gallon fresh water holding tank
Bellows Pump adds water to the bowl, sealed valve keeps odors in holding tank
product_description: Durable and compact, Porta Potti 135 portable toilet makes an ideal companion whenever you're on the road. Works in RVs, trucks, vans or even when you're out camping, offering the comfort of a fully functional toilet. 135 model uses a bellows pump for flushing and comes with removable seat and cover for easy cleaning. The portable toilet has two holding tanks: a 2. 6 gallons (9. 8l) fresh water tank and a 2. 6 gallons (9. 8l) wastewater holding tank. The freshwater tank ensures an average of 27 flushes, with a full tank. The wastewater holding tank comes with a sealed valve, which prevents odors from escaping, and the exclusive Pour-Out Spout, which ensures there's no backsplash during the emptying process. The portable toilet has white top and bottom with a grey middle-band and has the following dimensions: H: 15. 12 in (38. 4 cm) - from top to bottom - lid closed, L: 13. 54 in (34. 4 cm) - from front to back, W: 12. 13 in (30. 8 cm) - from side to side. Caution: Do not use stiff brushes or homemade products to clean or lubricate the valve and seal of your portable toilet, as these will damage the seals and surfaces, causing odors to escape from holding tanks

name: VEVOR Portable Toilet for Camping, RV Toilet with Carry Bag, 5.3 Gal Waste Tank & 3.2 Gal Flush Tank, Push-Button Pressurized Flush Commode, Leak-proof and Odourless Travel Toilet for Camping Car
short_description: Flushable & Detachable: No more frantic searches for the nearest restroom while camping or traveling! This toilet comes with detachable waste and flush tanks. Once securely fixed in place, its stable structure can support up to 330 lbs / 149.7 kg without deformation, ensuring a comfortable experience without collapsing or deforming. With an ergonomic height of 15.7" / 400 mm, it is suitable for pregnant women, children, and the elderly.

Pressurized Flushing with up to 200 Uses: The 3.2 gal / 12 L flush tank features a manual piston pump for pressurized flushing, providing up to 200 flushes per fill, saving water with no need for frequent refills. With a T-shaped full-coverage outlet design, it ensures quick and thorough cleaning from every angle. The waste tank's interior walls are made of easy-to-clean and highly durable materials to prevent waste buildup.

Leak-proof & Odor-reducing: The sliding seal discharge valve at the top of the 5.3 gal / 20 L sewage tank, along with a sealing ring at the discharge outlet, ensures excellent sealing, even after 12 hours of full water immersion, preventing leaks during bumpy travels and reducing everyday odors.

Easy to Empty and Clean: Featuring a straight discharge outlet design, there's no need for extra complicated operations—just add water, shake, and pour out the waste directly. The toilet seat and lid can be individually removed for easy cleaning.

Comes with a Portable Storage Bag: The toilet includes a storage bag, perfect for use during outdoor adventures or camping trips, making it easy to carry and move, providing immediate relief for your urgent needs.
